Description:
Dare to Dream in Doncaster
Gleaming with potential in a highly sought after pocket of Doncaster, this three bedroom family home provides an abundance of living zones and outdoor living which combine effortlessly on this sizeable allotment to provide comfortable family living for many years to come.
Expansive open-plan living greets you upon entry, with a theme of muted tones and polished timber floors creating a striking contrast, highlighting gorgeous garden views available from the many windows which allow light to flood in from every direction. Complete with a well-appointed u-shaped kitchen which boasts quality appliances, sleek cabinetry and an abundance of bench space, hosting gatherings that excite your guests have never been easier, and after a generous dinner, take your guests to the ground floor where your very own private cinema, billiard room and built-in bar await.
Three spacious bedrooms occupy the rear of the home, two with built-in robes and the large master suite taking full advantage of a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the central bathroom offers a deep spa bath where you can enjoy the ultimate relaxation whenever you please.
Nestled amongst parks such as Marshall Avenue Reserve and Koonung Creek Linear Park which offers lengthy walking trails youre spoilt for choice when it comes to outdoor activities. Youre also nearby to great schools such as Doncaster Secondary College, Doncaster Gardens Primary, shopping at Westfield Doncaster and with easy access to major arterials this location has it all.

Three generously sized bedrooms
Expansive open-plan living/kitchen/dining
Sizeable allotment of approx 1194m2
Surrounded by parklands, close to great schools
